title: throwing for skins
body: so last game we had a bot lane that said "DUO OR FEED" in lobby and just hinted all game that they were gonna afk. then this cait and blitz get offered by veigar to get them a free skin. why do these people even exist because if they are like that in game they are obviously wastes of oxygen in real life too. [REMOVED} and  [REMOVED] are their names, they need to beshown so others dont get shit on like this. this is unaccepable
